entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
